TopicTitle: I didnt really think using the upslope to the runway as a ramp would work, but...

Articles.Content: Seriouslt, I launched this thing with only 50-80meters of grass before hitting the runway
Can you do it tge other way around?
Is that how you lost the lower center air intake? nyuk nyuk

Giant in the Playground is in the background on your desktop (cheers!)

Nice tho to know you have Short take off ability.. short landings? maybe not so much
